sn48.41:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
sn48.41:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito pacchātape nisinno hoti piṭṭhiṃ otāpayamāno.
sn48.41:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn48.41:5.2: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā bhagavato gattāni pāṇinā anomajjanto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn48.41:5.4: Na cevaṃ dāni, bhante, bhagavato tāva parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto, sithilāni ca gattāni sabbāni valiyajātāni, purato pabbhāro ca kāyo, dissati ca indriyānaṃ aññathattaṃ—
sn48.41:6.2: jarādhammo yobbaññe, byādhidhammo ārogye, maraṇadhammo jīvite.
sn48.41:6.3: Na ceva tāva parisuddho hoti chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto, sithilāni ca honti gattāni sabbāni valiyajātāni, purato pabbhāro ca kāyo, dissati ca indriyānaṃ aññathattaṃ—
sn48.41:7.2: Idaṃ vatvā ca sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
sn48.41:9.2: sopi maccuparāyaṇo;
